Translations.Text: (hajharata ibrahime) kahyum ke allahana mokalela (pharista'o) tamaro sum hetu che
temane javaba apyo ke ame duracari koma tarapha mokalavamam avya che
jethi ame temana para matini kankari'o varasavi'e
je tara palanahara taraphathi nisanavali che, te hadavatavi nakhanara'o mate
basa! Jetala imanavala'o tyam hata, ame temane bacavi lidha
ane ame tyam musalmanonum phakata eka ja ghara joyum
ane ame tyam temana mate, je du:Khadayi yatanano dara rakhe che eka nisani chodi
musana (kis'sa) mam (pana amara tarapha thi eka nisani che) ke ame tene phira'ona tarapha khulla purava api mokalya
basa! Tene potana samarthya upara mondhu pheravyum ane kaheva lagyo a jadugara che athava to pagala che
Chevate ame tene ane tena laskarane amari yatanamam pakadi dariyamam nakhi didho ane te hato ja jhatakanine layaka
avi ja rite adamam (pana amara tarapha thi eka nisani che) jyare ame te'ona para ujjada pavana mokalyo
te je vastu para padati tene khokhara hadaka jevum (cure cura) kari nakhati hati
ane samuda (na kis'sa) mam pana (cetavani) che, jyare te'one kahevamam avyu ke tame thodaka divaso sudhi phayado uthavi lo
parantu te'o'e potana palanaharana adesano bhanga karyo, jethi te'one jotajatamam (vavajhoda) e nasta kari didha
basa! Na to te'o ubha tha'i sakya ane na to badalo la'i sakya
ane nuhani komane pana a pahela (avi ja dasa tha'i hati) te'o pana ghana ja avajnakari hata
akasane ame (potana) hatho vade banavyum che ane ni:Sanka ame vistrta karavavala che
ane dharati ne ame patharanum banavi didhum che. Basa! Ame khuba ja sari rite patharavavala che
ane dareka vastune ame jodakamam peda kari che. Jethi tame sikhamana prapta karo
basa! Tame allaha tarapha dodo bhago. Ni:Sanka hum tamane tena taraphathi khulle khulli cetavani apanaro chum
ane allaha sathe bija ko'ine pana pujya na theravo. Ni:Sanka hum tamane teni tarapha khulli cetavani apanara chum
